name: The Enemy Within
description: A deadly conflict leaves several Trill hosts dead and their symbionts with precious little time to be joined to the incoming new hosts. When a Borg cube abducts the symbionts, Starfleet puts out a distress call for a brave crew to rescue them!
rules:
-- Unique Federation, Augment, and Hirogen Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Riker, Bashir, Culber, or Physicians will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Riker, Bashir, Culber, or Physicians
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Kelis
featured_crew.flavor: Kelis, a playwright, seeks to use his plays as a way to prevent war between rival factions on his home planet.

rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

screens.text: "Captain, thank you for answering my hails. Several symbionts are in danger. Their hosts were killed when a plasma core malfunctioned. The symbionts that could be saved were on their way to Science Station Tango Sierra when they were intercepted by a Borg cube."

"Though I know your Federation has brokered a sort of truce with them, trust in the Borg is still paltry at best in most parts of the galaxy. Some are suggesting that the core malfunction was not an accident and that this was a ploy to assimilate the symbionts."

"Your concerns are fair and if I'm being honest, I have a few of my own. But the Borg assure us this cube is one that has gone rogue. They've put out their own call for help in returning the cube. A call it appears the Augments have been all too eager to answer."

"Sounds like they're embarrassed their drones managed to break free of the hive mind. If they want someone to catch that cube, my latinum's on the Hirogen. I'm sure they'd love a good Borg hunt. As long as we can convince them not to keep a symbiont as a trophy...."

"Captain, thank you for answering my hails. Several symbionts are in danger. Their hosts were killed when a plasma core malfunctioned. The symbionts that could be saved were on their way to Science Station Tango Sierra when they were intercepted by a Borg cube."

"Though I know your Federation has brokered a sort of truce with them, trust in the Borg is still paltry at best in most parts of the galaxy. Some are suggesting that the core malfunction was not an accident and that this was a ploy to assimilate the symbionts."

"Your concerns are fair and if I'm being honest, I have a few of my own. But the Borg assure us this cube is one that has gone rogue. They've put out their own call for help in returning the cube. A call it appears the Augments have been all too eager to answer."

"Sounds like they're embarrassed their drones managed to break free of the hive mind. If they want someone to catch that cube, my latinum's on the Hirogen. I'm sure they'd love a good Borg hunt. As long as we can convince them not to keep a symbiont as a trophy...."
